name: Abysm
description:
THIS DOESN'T RUN ON MOBILE (yet : ) )

THIS IS MEANT TO BE PLAYED IN GOOGLE CHROME (idk if it works in other browsers. If it doesn't work, try running it in Chrome)

- - New Biome: GEM CAVE - -

Abysm is a game about endless deep-sea diving. Your oxygen level slowly goes down, so be sure to pick up bubbles to refill it along the way. Pick up elusive Bottles to upgrade your abilites: Jet, Harpoon, and Saw (They're somewhat rare).  Explore a plethora of biomes, from the Lost City of Atlantis and the Kelp Forest, to the Mad Laboratory and the Nuclear Wastes there are a variety of locations you'll pass as you dive.

How deep can you go?

Controls:

Left Arrow - Turn right

Right Arrow - Turn left

(You can invert the controls)

Spacebar/Down Arrow - Use Ability

Up Arrow - 180° turn

For more information, click the "?" button in-game.

Our discord: https://discord.gg/76j5mJJ

Our Subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AbysmGame/

All Rights Reserved
